title: Sri Lanka news: India, 34 other countries get visa free access from October 1, policy to last 6 months. Check details
description:
Travellers from as many as 35 countries, including Indians, will be able to enjoy visa-free entry to the island country of Sri Lanka from October this year, PTI reported.

As per local reports on August 21, the Sri Lankan government has approved visa-free access to citizens from 35 countries, includ...

title: Sri Lanka's key inflation rate falls to 0.5% in August
description:
By Uditha Jayasinghe Sri Lanka's key inflation rate falls to 0.5% in August

BENGALURU/COLOMBO, - Sri Lanka's key inflation rate fell to 0.5% in August on the year from 2.4% last month, the statistics department said on Friday.

The Colombo Consumer Price Index, a leading indicator for broader natio...
